articles.description: Narendra Modi stadium in Ahmedabad will be welcoming home team Gujarat Titans on May 29. A sold out stadium is expected to be buzzing in support of the home team who will play the IPL final in their first season.

articles.author: Nagraj Gollapudi

articles.description: Shastri wants questionable wide and no-ball calls to be directly dealt with by specialist TV umpires
